name: General Mix 2 Quiz | Mixed  5 Questions | 5 Questions

questions.text: Who was the French sculptor who made the model for the Statue of Liberty?
What type of food are Andouille?
How many lines does the sonnet type Quatorzain have?
How many syllabic Glyphs are there in the Mayan hieroglyphics?
According to Duchamp, what is the second most radical form of protest a person can perform after suicide?
